item.description:
Come join us for an afternoon of healing activities. You can receive a massage, Reiki treatment or a reading. Each ten minute session is $10, but you can get 40 minutes of mix and match sessions for $35.

Many come and sit at the table for good conversation as well while drinking delicious tea!

Children are definitely welcome... we have a four year old who is apprenticing. As she says, "I like to sees the energies rise and help the people on the table." She herself is beginning to assist the practitioners, lending her own way of linking to the energy to help them help others.
item.name: Healing Afternoon
